plugin.documentation: Use this plugin to build the documentation.

arg.name: -android
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build the documentation for android.

arg.name: -extern
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build the documentation for extern files.

arg.name: -html5
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build the documentation for html5.

arg.name: -ios
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build the documentation for ios.

arg.name: -full
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build the documentation for every supported platform (android, html5, ios).

arg.name: -xml-only
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you only want to build the xml file(s) for the defined platform(s).

arg.name: -rebuild-std
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to rebuild the local Haxe std documentation (by default, if does not exist).

arg.name: -theme
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build the documentation with a specific theme (located in template folder).
